name: links
description: Contains the array of the first column of footer link items.

params.name: url
params.description: Href attribute for a footer link item in the first column.

params.name: label
params.description: The label for a footer link item in the first column.

name: linksColumn2
description: Contains the array of the second column of footer link items.

params.name: url
params.description: Href attribute for a footer link item in the second column.

params.name: label
params.description: The label for a footer link item in the second column.

name: linksColumn3
description: Contains the array of the third column of footer link items.

params.name: url
params.description: Href attribute for a footer link item in the third column.

params.name: label
params.description: The label for a footer link item in the third column.

name: copyright
description: Optional text for the copyright notice in the footer.

name: classes
description: Classes to add to the footer container.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the footer container.

name: metaLinks
description: Contains the array of key policy footer link items.

params.name: url
params.description: Href attribute for a key policy footer link item.

params.name: label
params.description: The label for a key policy footer link item.
